longBusinessSummary: Avalon Acquisition Inc. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company focuses on businesses in the financial services and financial technologies industries. Avalon Acquisition Inc. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. S. Craig Cognetti C.F.A., CFA
companyOfficers.title: CEO & Director
